items.question: When do you charge my credit card?
items.answer: We charge all credit cards on the day of service, after the cleaning is finished.

items.question: What fees could I incur by canceling or rescheduling?
items.answer: We only charge fees when we really need to. If you cancel or reschedule an appointment after 3:00 pm the day before your cleaning, we may charge a $40 last-minute change fee. If you choose to cancel your recurring service before your second visit, we will charge you $69, to bring your pricing closer to our 'one-time' service offering.

items.question: How do I stop my recurring service?
items.answer: Email or call us. You can stop whenever you like.

items.question: How will I know when the maids are coming?
items.answer: We send ETA text messages, or notifications from our app, when we're on our way to your home.

items.question: How do the cleaners enter my home?
items.answer: You can either be at home to let them in, hide a key somewhere, or give us a lockbox code to keep on file.

items.question: What won't our Pristine staff clean?
items.answer: For health reasons, our teams will not clean blood, feces, vomit, or urine from animals or humans.
